metadata.name: Kaleidoscopic Portals
metadata.description:
"KALEIDOSCOPIC PORTALS" is a mesmerizing digital artwork that explores the intricate beauty of sacred geometry. 

The intricate mandala design, rendered in brilliant white, creates an otherworldly effect against the deep black background.
 Four spherical shapes at the center of the design add a sense of depth and dimension to the piece, further enhancing its hypnotic quality.

Size: 3508 x 4961 px
